description:
For years, businesses and individuals here in Phoenix, Arizona, and elsewhere across the state have relied on Cronus Law for their legal needs. As such, people have come to expect compassionate, competent and aggressive advocacy from our attorneys. Since its inception, our law firm has strived to meet the needs of our clients as they attempt to navigate legal issues involving professional and personal matters, such as the following:

• Corporate law, government contracts, commercial litigation and employment law
• Medical marijuana business law
• Family law, estate planning and immigration
• Personal injury and medical malpractice
• Criminal defense
• Real estate law, including landlord and tenant law

Our law firm is dedicated to finding innovative and comprehensive solutions designed to help you achieve the best possible outcome to your case considering your unique circumstances. To that end, we will use all the considerable knowledge, resources and experience at our disposal on your behalf.

Whether this means negotiating a settlement or taking your matter to trial, you will receive the superior support and assistance you need. When you work with us, you can expect our attorneys to explain your rights, give you an honest assessment of your case and provide you with feasible legal options.

Since time is often of the essence in legal matters, it would most likely benefit you to schedule an initial consultation as soon as possible to find how our law firm can help you. With the exception of landlord-tenant, employment and family law cases, your initial consultation could be free. We also offer virtual consultations because your and your family's safety is paramount to everyone here at Cronus Law.
